means: （使）倾斜，屈身( lean的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
sentence.Network_cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

sentence.Network_en: His mother leaned forward and spoke to him in urgent undertones.
sentence.Network_cn: 他母亲身子前倾，小声而急切地跟他说话。

sentence.Network_en: Daniel leaned back on the sofa, still chewing on his apple.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹尼尔倚在沙发上，嘴里还在嚼着苹果。

PerfectNetExp.abs: She leaned over to kiss him ., 她探身去吻他.
she leaned her head back and whispered the news ., 她向后仰着头 , 小声说出了这个消息.
I leaned and wiped the perspiration from his forehead .我俯下身，擦去他额头上的汗珠。
We were and that , and she leaned and started sucking on my ear ., 我们东拉西扯了一会儿 , 她靠了过来开始舔我的耳朵.

list.abs: 在精益制造（Lean Manufacturing）系统中，工业工程师致力于消灭在生产过程中对时间，经费，材料，能源以及其他资源的浪费。他 …
贫_百度百科 ... ◎ 贫苦[ badly off;poverty-stricken] ◎ 贫矿[ borasca;lean ore] ◎ 贫困[ poor;depressed].
石油词汇英语翻译(L)--石油百科 ... lean coal 贫煤 lean gas 贫气 lean glycol 贫乙二醇.
精益创业(lean Startup)提出者Eric Ries：一天改进产品50次精益创业    Qing    微博相关博文精彩图文推荐博文

entry.def: When you lean in a particular direction, you bend your body in that direction.

example.ex: Eileen leaned across and opened the passenger door...
example.tran: 艾琳倾身把后座门打开。

example.ex: He leaned forward to give her a kiss...

entry.def: If you lean on or against someone or something, you rest against them so that they partly support your weight. If you lean an object on or against something, you place the object so that it is partly supported by that thing.

example.ex: She was feeling tired and was glad to lean against him...
example.tran: 她正感到有些疲倦，因此很高兴可以靠在他身上。

example.ex: Lean the plants against a wall and cover the roots with peat...
example.tran: 把植物靠墙摆放，用泥煤盖住根部。

entry.def: If you describe someone as lean, you mean that they are thin but look strong and healthy.

example.ex: Like most athletes, she was lean and muscular...
example.tran: 跟大部分运动员一样，她身形清瘦，肌肉结实。

example.ex: She watched the tall, lean figure step into the car.
example.tran: 她看着那个瘦高个儿上了车。

entry.def: If meat is lean, it does not have very much fat.

example.ex: It is a beautiful meat, very lean and tender.
...the leanest ground beef you can get.
example.tran: 买得到的最瘦的碎牛肉

entry.def: If you describe an organization as lean, you mean that it has become more efficient and less wasteful by getting rid of staff, or by dropping projects which were unprofitable.

example.ex: The value of the pound will force British companies to be leaner and fitter.
example.tran: 英镑目前的汇率将迫使英国公司厉行精兵简政。

example.ex: ...cutting corporate flab and building leaner companies.
example.tran: 削减企业赘肉，建立瘦身型公司

entry.def: If you describe periods of time as lean, you mean that people have less of something such as money or are less successful than they used to be.

example.ex: With fewer tourists in town, the taxi trade is going through its leanest patch for 30 years.
example.tran: 随着城里游客的减少，出租车行业正遭受30年来最不景气的时期。

auth_sentence.content: She also leaned toward the other person too much.
auth_sentence.res_content: She also leaned toward the other person too much.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She also leaned toward the other person too much.

auth_sentence.content: She leaned into her turns more than other skiers.
auth_sentence.res_content: She leaned into her turns more than other skiers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She leaned into her turns more than other skiers.

auth_sentence.content: She leaned to the side and slapped her thigh.
auth_sentence.res_content: She leaned to the side and slapped her thigh.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She leaned to the side and slapped her thigh.
